item.description: Human Paladin Important Relations Adventuring with [[Asurak]], [[Avaaros Wolfwalker]], [[Heilar]], [[Reznak]], [[Ruby]], [[Runa]], and [[Tia Thunderstep]] and, newly also [[Sealion]] Paladin of the [[Chainbreaker]]
